channel.title: http on Hyperfoil
channel.description: Recent content in http on Hyperfoil

item.title: HTTP
item.description: All servers that Hyperfoil should contact must be declared in this section. Before the benchmark starts Hyperfoil agents will open connections to the target servers; if this connection fails the benchmark is terminated immediatelly. You can either declare single target server (the default one) within this section or more of them: http: host: http://example.com ... http: - host: http://example.com sharedConnections: 100 - host: http://example.com:8080 sharedConnections: 50 HTTP configuration has these properties:
